title: BRIEF-ASE postpones share settlement of public tender offer for Siliconware due to typhoon
text:
BRIEF-ASE postpones share settlement of public tender offer for Siliconware due to typhoon Sept 29 
Sept 29 Advanced Semiconductor Engineering Inc 
* Says postpones share settlement and payment of public tender offer for Siliconware due to typhoon 
Source text on Eikon: 
Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
